00019 typedef enum {
00020     E_SUCCESS=0,
00021     E_INVALID_NUM_QUBITS,
00022     E_INVALID_TARGET_QUBIT,
00023     E_INVALID_CONTROL_QUBIT,
00024     E_INVALID_STATE_INDEX,
00025     E_INVALID_NUM_AMPS,
00026     E_INVALID_OFFSET_NUM_AMPS,
00027     E_TARGET_IS_CONTROL,
00028     E_TARGET_IN_CONTROLS,
00029     E_TARGETS_NOT_UNIQUE,
00030     E_INVALID_NUM_CONTROLS,
00031     E_NON_UNITARY_MATRIX,
00032     E_NON_UNITARY_COMPLEX_PAIR,
00033     E_ZERO_VECTOR,

00051 static const char* errorMessages[] = {
00052     [E_INVALID_NUM_QUBITS] = "Invalid number of qubits. Must create >0.",
00053     [E_INVALID_TARGET_QUBIT] = "Invalid target qubit. Note qubits are zero indexed.",
00054     [E_INVALID_CONTROL_QUBIT] = "Invalid control qubit. Note qubits are zero indexed.",
00055     [E_INVALID_STATE_INDEX] = "Invalid state index. Must be >=0 and <2^numQubits.",
00056     [E_INVALID_NUM_AMPS] = "Invalid number of amplitudes. Must be >=0 and <=2^numQubits.",
00057     [E_INVALID_OFFSET_NUM_AMPS] = "More amplitudes given than exist in the statevector from the given starting index.",
00058     [E_TARGET_IS_CONTROL] = "Control qubit cannot equal target qubit.",
00059     [E_TARGET_IN_CONTROLS] = "Control qubits cannot include target qubit.",
00060     [E_TARGETS_NOT_UNIQUE] = "The two target qubits must be unique.",
00061     [E_INVALID_NUM_CONTROLS] = "Invalid number of control qubits. Must be >0 and <numQubits.",
00062     [E_NON_UNITARY_MATRIX] = "Matrix is not unitary.",
00063     [E_NON_UNITARY_COMPLEX_PAIR] = "Compact matrix formed by given complex numbers is not unitary.",
00064     [E_ZERO_VECTOR] = "Invalid axis vector. Must be non-zero.",
00065     [E_SYS_TOO_BIG_TO_PRINT] = "Invalid system size. Cannot print output for systems greater than 5 qubits.",
00066     [E_COLLAPSE_STATE_ZERO_PROB] = "Can't collapse to state with zero probability.",
00067     [E_INVALID_QUBIT_OUTCOME] = "Invalid measurement outcome -- must be either 0 or 1.",
00068     [E_CANNOT_OPEN_FILE] = "Could not open file",
00069     [E_SECOND_ARG_MUST_BE_STATEVEC] = "Second argument must be a state-vector.",
00070     [E_MISMATCHING_QUREG_DIMENSIONS] = "Dimensions of the qubit registers don't match.",
00071     [E_MISMATCHING_QUREG_TYPES] = "Registers must both be state-vectors or both be density matrices.",
00072     [E_DEFINED_ONLY_FOR_STATEVECS] = "Operation valid only for state-vectors.",
00073     [E_DEFINED_ONLY_FOR_DENSMATRS] = "Operation valid only for density matrices.",
00074     [E_INVALID_PROB] = "Probabilities must be in [0, 1].",
00075     [E_UNNORM_PROBS] = "Probabilities must sum to ~1.",
00076     [E_INVALID_ONE_QUBIT_DEPHASE_PROB] = "The probability of a single qubit dephase error cannot exceed 1/2, which maximally mixes.",
00077     [E_INVALID_TWO_QUBIT_DEPHASE_PROB] = "The probability of a two-qubit qubit dephase error cannot exceed 3/4, which maximally mixes.",
00078     [E_INVALID_ONE_QUBIT_DEPOL_PROB] = "The probability of a single qubit depolarising error cannot exceed 3/4, which maximally mixes.",
00079     [E_INVALID_TWO_QUBIT_DEPOL_PROB] = "The probability of a two-qubit depolarising error cannot exceed 15/16, which maximally mixes."
00080 };
00081 
00082 void exitWithError(ErrorCode code, const char* func){
00083     printf("!!!\n");
00084     printf("QuEST Error in function %s: %s\n", func, errorMessages[code]);
00085     printf("!!!\n");
00086     printf("exiting..\n");
00087     exit(code);
00088 }
00089 
00090 void QuESTAssert(int isValid, ErrorCode code, const char* func){
00091     if (!isValid) exitWithError(code, func);
00092 }
00093 
00094 int isComplexUnit(Complex alpha) {
00095     return (absReal(1 - sqrt(alpha.real*alpha.real + alpha.imag*alpha.imag)) < REAL_EPS); 
00096 }
00097 
00098 int isVectorUnit(qreal ux, qreal uy, qreal uz) {
00099     return (absReal(1 - sqrt(ux*ux + uy*uy + uz*uz)) < REAL_EPS );
00100 }
00101 
00102 int isComplexPairUnitary(Complex alpha, Complex beta) {
00103     return ( absReal( -1
00104                 + alpha.real*alpha.real 
00105                 + alpha.imag*alpha.imag
00106                 + beta.real*beta.real 
00107                 + beta.imag*beta.imag) < REAL_EPS );
00108 }
00109 
00110 int isMatrixUnitary(ComplexMatrix2 u) {
00111     if ( absReal( u.r0c0.real*u.r0c0.real 
00112                 + u.r0c0.imag*u.r0c0.imag
00113                 + u.r1c0.real*u.r1c0.real
00114                 + u.r1c0.imag*u.r1c0.imag - 1) > REAL_EPS ) return 0;
00115     if ( absReal( u.r0c1.real*u.r0c1.real 
00116                 + u.r0c1.imag*u.r0c1.imag
00117                 + u.r1c1.real*u.r1c1.real
00118                 + u.r1c1.imag*u.r1c1.imag - 1) > REAL_EPS ) return 0;
00119     if ( absReal( u.r0c0.real*u.r0c1.real 
00120                 + u.r0c0.imag*u.r0c1.imag
00121                 + u.r1c0.real*u.r1c1.real
00122                 + u.r1c0.imag*u.r1c1.imag) > REAL_EPS ) return 0;
00123     if ( absReal( u.r0c1.real*u.r0c0.imag
00124                 - u.r0c0.real*u.r0c1.imag
00125                 + u.r1c1.real*u.r1c0.imag
00126                 - u.r1c0.real*u.r1c1.imag) > REAL_EPS ) return 0;
00127     return 1;
00128 }
00129 
00130 void validateCreateNumQubits(int numQubits, const char* caller) {
00131     QuESTAssert(numQubits>0, E_INVALID_NUM_QUBITS, caller);
00132 }
00133 
00134 void validateStateIndex(Qureg qureg, long long int stateInd, const char* caller) {
00135     long long int stateMax = 1LL << qureg.numQubitsRepresented;
00136     QuESTAssert(stateInd>=0 && stateInd<stateMax, E_INVALID_STATE_INDEX, caller);
00137 }
00138 
00139 void validateNumAmps(Qureg qureg, long long int startInd, long long int numAmps, const char* caller) {
00140     validateStateIndex(qureg, startInd, caller);
00141     QuESTAssert(numAmps >= 0 && numAmps <= qureg.numAmpsTotal, E_INVALID_NUM_AMPS, caller);
00142     QuESTAssert(numAmps + startInd <= qureg.numAmpsTotal, E_INVALID_OFFSET_NUM_AMPS, caller);
00143 }
00144 
00145 void validateTarget(Qureg qureg, int targetQubit, const char* caller) {
00146     QuESTAssert(targetQubit>=0 && targetQubit<qureg.numQubitsRepresented, E_INVALID_TARGET_QUBIT, caller);
00147 }
00148 
00149 void validateControl(Qureg qureg, int controlQubit, const char* caller) {
00150     QuESTAssert(controlQubit>=0 && controlQubit<qureg.numQubitsRepresented, E_INVALID_CONTROL_QUBIT, caller);
00151 }
00152 
00153 void validateControlTarget(Qureg qureg, int controlQubit, int targetQubit, const char* caller) {
00154     validateTarget(qureg, targetQubit, caller);
00155     validateControl(qureg, controlQubit, caller);
00156     QuESTAssert(controlQubit != targetQubit, E_TARGET_IS_CONTROL, caller);
00157 }
00158 
00159 void validateUniqueTargets(Qureg qureg, int qubit1, int qubit2, const char* caller) {
00160     validateTarget(qureg, qubit1, caller);
00161     validateTarget(qureg, qubit2, caller);
00162     QuESTAssert(qubit1 != qubit2, E_TARGETS_NOT_UNIQUE, caller);
00163 }
00164 
00165 void validateNumControls(Qureg qureg, const int numControlQubits, const char* caller) {
00166     // this could reject repeated qubits and cite "too many" but oh well
00167     QuESTAssert(numControlQubits>0 && numControlQubits<=qureg.numQubitsRepresented, E_INVALID_NUM_CONTROLS, caller);
00168 }
00169 
00170 void validateMultiControls(Qureg qureg, int* controlQubits, const int numControlQubits, const char* caller) {
00171     validateNumControls(qureg, numControlQubits, caller);
00172     for (int i=0; i < numControlQubits; i++) {
00173         validateControl(qureg, controlQubits[i], caller);
00174     }
00175 }
00176 
00177 void validateMultiControlsTarget(Qureg qureg, int* controlQubits, const int numControlQubits, const int targetQubit, const char* caller) {
00178     validateTarget(qureg, targetQubit, caller);
00179     validateMultiControls(qureg, controlQubits, numControlQubits, caller);
00180     for (int i=0; i < numControlQubits; i++)
00181         QuESTAssert(controlQubits[i] != targetQubit, E_TARGET_IN_CONTROLS, caller);
00182 }
00183 
00184 void validateUnitaryMatrix(ComplexMatrix2 u, const char* caller) {
00185     QuESTAssert(isMatrixUnitary(u), E_NON_UNITARY_MATRIX, caller);
00186 }
00187 
00188 void validateUnitaryComplexPair(Complex alpha, Complex beta, const char* caller) {
00189     QuESTAssert(isComplexPairUnitary(alpha, beta), E_NON_UNITARY_COMPLEX_PAIR, caller);
00190 }
00191 
00192 void validateVector(Vector vec, const char* caller) {
00193     QuESTAssert(getVectorMagnitude(vec) > REAL_EPS, E_ZERO_VECTOR, caller);
00194 }
00195 
00196 void validateStateVecQureg(Qureg qureg, const char* caller) {
00197     QuESTAssert( ! qureg.isDensityMatrix, E_DEFINED_ONLY_FOR_STATEVECS, caller);
00198 }
00199 
00200 void validateDensityMatrQureg(Qureg qureg, const char* caller) {
00201     QuESTAssert(qureg.isDensityMatrix, E_DEFINED_ONLY_FOR_DENSMATRS, caller);
00202 }
00203 
00204 void validateOutcome(int outcome, const char* caller) {
00205     QuESTAssert(outcome==0 || outcome==1, E_INVALID_QUBIT_OUTCOME, caller);
00206 }
00207 
00208 void validateMeasurementProb(qreal prob, const char* caller) {
00209     QuESTAssert(prob>REAL_EPS, E_COLLAPSE_STATE_ZERO_PROB, caller);
00210 }
00211 
00212 void validateMatchingQuregDims(Qureg qureg1, Qureg qureg2, const char *caller) {
00213     QuESTAssert(qureg1.numQubitsRepresented==qureg2.numQubitsRepresented, E_MISMATCHING_QUREG_DIMENSIONS, caller);
00214 }
00215 
00216 void validateMatchingQuregTypes(Qureg qureg1, Qureg qureg2, const char *caller) {
00217     QuESTAssert(qureg1.isDensityMatrix==qureg2.isDensityMatrix, E_MISMATCHING_QUREG_TYPES, caller);
00218 }
00219 
00220 void validateSecondQuregStateVec(Qureg qureg2, const char *caller) {
00221     QuESTAssert( ! qureg2.isDensityMatrix, E_SECOND_ARG_MUST_BE_STATEVEC, caller);
00222 }
00223 
00224 void validateFileOpened(int found, const char* caller) {
00225     QuESTAssert(found, E_CANNOT_OPEN_FILE, caller);
00226 }
00227 
00228 void validateProb(qreal prob, const char* caller) {
00229     QuESTAssert(prob >= 0 && prob <= 1, E_INVALID_PROB, caller);
00230 }
00231 
00232 void validateNormProbs(qreal prob1, qreal prob2, const char* caller) {
00233     validateProb(prob1, caller);
00234     validateProb(prob2, caller);
00235     
00236     qreal sum = prob1 + prob2;
00237     QuESTAssert(absReal(1 - sum) < REAL_EPS, E_UNNORM_PROBS, caller);
00238 }
00239 
00240 void validateOneQubitDephaseProb(qreal prob, const char* caller) {
00241     validateProb(prob, caller);
00242     QuESTAssert(prob <= 1/2.0, E_INVALID_ONE_QUBIT_DEPHASE_PROB, caller);
00243 }
00244 
00245 void validateTwoQubitDephaseProb(qreal prob, const char* caller) {
00246     validateProb(prob, caller);
00247     QuESTAssert(prob <= 3/4.0, E_INVALID_TWO_QUBIT_DEPHASE_PROB, caller);
00248 }
00249 
00250 void validateOneQubitDepolProb(qreal prob, const char* caller) {
00251     validateProb(prob, caller);
00252     QuESTAssert(prob <= 3/4.0, E_INVALID_ONE_QUBIT_DEPOL_PROB, caller);
00253 }
00254 
00255 void validateTwoQubitDepolProb(qreal prob, const char* caller) {
00256     validateProb(prob, caller);
00257     QuESTAssert(prob <= 15/16.0, E_INVALID_TWO_QUBIT_DEPOL_PROB, caller);
00258 }
